alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:13PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lancaster and east central Seward Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 512 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Emerald, or 8 miles west of Lincoln, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pioneers Park around 530 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Raymond and Lincoln Airport. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 388 and 401. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
